page.title: 09Entertainment
page.content: There are several working mens clubs, and social clubs where people meet at night for a chat and drink together.Some have indoor games like darts,dominoes,and pool,and at weekends there may be performers. The Edward Alderton Theatre is a small well equipped theatre which is run by the Adult Education Centre.Lots of plays are put on by amateur actors and directors.From the 18th to 25th May they are doing ACCIDENTAL DEATH OF AN ANARCHIST by Dario Fio. A lot of elderly people play Bingo in the afternoons and evenings at the Top Rank Bingo Hall in Upper Wickham Lane. Adults generally enjoy things like reading,stamp collecting,gardening, computer programming and various sports.Children have Cubs,Brownies, Guides,dancing and clubs run by local churches as well as many sports.
